name: Slave Lord: Elven Conquest
description:
You, The Dark Lord, have captured a pair of elven would-be assassins. Make them join your harem and watch them gradually turn into your sex-crazed concubines!

Train

Choose how to train your harem members. H-scenes are hand-drawn and animated.
Watch them transform into insatiable sex slaves, and unlock their darkest desires.

Interact

Talk to characters and make the story unfold.

Choices

Will you be a cruel or kind master? You decide how to treat your harem. Multiple endings await.

Side quests

Go on erotic adventures around a dark fantasy world, where you'll get to conquer more sexy girls.
